00037   namespace ltl

00039 
00042     class atomic_prop : public ref_formula
00043     {
00044     public:
00047       static atomic_prop* instance(const std::string& name, environment& env);
00048 
00049       virtual void accept(visitor& visitor);
00050       virtual void accept(const_visitor& visitor) const;
00051 
00053       const std::string& name() const;
00055       environment& env() const;
00056 
00058       virtual std::string dump() const;
00059 
00061       static unsigned instance_count();
00063       static std::ostream& dump_instances(std::ostream& os);
00064 
00065     protected:
00066       atomic_prop(const std::string& name, environment& env);
00067       virtual ~atomic_prop();
00068 
00069       typedef std::pair<std::string, environment*> pair;
00070       typedef std::map<pair, atomic_prop*> map;
00071       static map instances;
00072 
00073     private:
00074       std::string name_;
00075       environment* env_;
00076     };
